description: MCP Server for Dida365 (TickTick) Task Management Integration

environmentVariables.name: DIDA365_CLIENT_ID
environmentVariables.description: OAuth2 Client ID for Dida365/TickTick API

environmentVariables.name: DIDA365_CLIENT_SECRET
environmentVariables.description: OAuth2 Client Secret for Dida365/TickTick API

environmentVariables.name: DIDA365_REGION
environmentVariables.description: Region for the service (china or international)
